posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Just a note of caution, if I may. If you're intending to take this one to WoG (from your other recent thread), it might be worth bearing in mind Max's "AC is king" mantra. If you look at Grimnir's original there's no Dev Crit, though he does go for 2 Weapons of Choice/ WF (Battleaxe and Warhammer), so if you were just to concentrate on one weapon you might be more able to mitigate that number of feats used for some more - dare I say it - defensive ones (and Blind Fight becomes more available as well). Not quite sure what atm (maybe Imp Expertise with that level of AB is one), but it might be worth a thought.

Of course, if you're not going to WoG with the build, please ignore this post!

Go well - cheers
